main event: A bright object was observed moving erratically, possibly a balloon, for a duration of 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was very bright and observed at a distance, The object's movements were inconsistent with those of a typical balloon, No sound was heard during the sighting, The object appeared large and hazy at times, The sighting was recorded as part of Project Blue Book, indicating systematic UFO investigation.
witness description: the observer noted the object's erratic movements and bright appearance
